name: Equality
description: to treat others as equal to myself and vice versa

name: Fitness
description: to maintain or improve or look after my physical and mental health

name: Compassion/self-compassion
description: to act kindly towards myself and others who are suffering

name: Conformity
description: to be respectful and obedient of rules and obligations

name: Acceptance/self-acceptance
description: to be accepting of myself, others, life, etc

name: Patience
description: to wait caclmly for what I want

name: Pleasure
description: to create and give pleasure to myself or others

name: Kindness
description: to be kind, considerate, nuturing or caring towards myself or others

name: Industry
description: to be industrious, hardworking and dedicated

name: Safelty and protection
description: to secure, protect or ensure my own safety, or that of others

name: Self development
description: to keep growing, advancing or improving in knowledge, skills, character or life experience

name: Mindfulness
description: to be open to, engaged in and curious about the present moment

name: Persistence and commitment
description: to continue resolutely, despite problems and difficulties

name: Reciprocity
description: to build relationships in which there is a fair balance of giving and taking

name: Adventure
description: to be adventurous; to activeli explore novel or stimulating experiences

name: Beauty
description: to appreciate, create, nuture or cultivate beauty in myself, others, the environment

name: Intimacy
description: to open up, reveal, and share myself emotionally or physically

name: Romance
description: to be romantic; to display and express love or strong affection

name: Excitement
description: to seek, create and engage in activities that are exciting or stimulating

name: Order
description: to be orderly and organised

name: Sexuality
description: to explore or express my sexuality

name: Power
description: to strongly influence or wield authority over others e.g. taking charge, leading, organising

name: Friendliness
description: to be friendly, companionable or agreeable toward others

name: Contribution and generosity
description: to contribute, give, help, assist or share

name: Supportiveness
description: to be supportive, helpful and avaiable to myself or others

name: Self-awareness
description: to be aware of my own thoughts, feelings and actions

name: Challenge
description: to keep challenging myself to grow, learn and improve

name: Assertiveness
description: to respectfully stand up for my rights and request what I want

name: Fun and humour
description: to be fun loving; to seek, create and engage in fun filled activities

name: Responsibility
description: to be responsible and accountable for my actions

name: Caring/self care
description: to be caring towards myself, others, the environment etc

name: Fairness and justice
description: to be fair and just to myself and others

name: Gratitude
description: to be grateful for appreciative of myself, others and life

name: Respect/self-respect
description: to treat myself and others with care and consideration

name: Sensuality and pleasure
description: to create or enjoy pleasurable and sensual experiences

name: Encouragement
description: to encourage and reward behaviour that I value in myself or others

name: Authenticity
description: to be authentic, genuine and real; to be true to myself

name: Trust
description: to be trustworthy; to be loyal, faithful, sincere and reliable

name: Flexibility
description: to adjust and adapt readily to changing circumstances

name: Creativity
description: to be creative or innovative

name: Sensuality
description: to create, explore and enjoy experiences that stimulate the five senses

name: Love
description: to act lovingly or affectionately toward myself or others

name: Skilfulness
description: to continually practice and imprive my skills and apply myself fully

name: Self control
description: to act in accordnace with my own ideals

name: Spirituality
description: to connect with things bigger than myself

name: Connection
description: to engage fully in whatever I'm doing and be fully present with others

name: Courage
description: to be courageous or brave; to persist in the face of fear, threat or difficulty

name: Open mindedness
description: to thing things through, see things from others' points of view and weigh evidence fairly

name: Curiosity
description: to be curious, open minded and interested; to explore and discover

name: Honesty
description: to be honest, truthful and sincere with myself and others

name: Self care
description: to look after my health and wellbeign and get my needs met

name: Freedom and independence
description: to choose how I live and help others do likewise

name: Co-operation
description: to be co-operative and collaborative with others

name: Forgiveness/self-forgiveness
description: to be forgiving toward myself or others
